Detailed Description

Stores a rule for a single alignment flag.

Rules for alignment flags can be one of three states:

  • NA - All flag values are valid
  • Off - Flag is valid if OFF
  • On - Flag is valid if ON

bool SnowTools::Flag::parseRuleLine ( std::string &  val,
std::regex &  reg 
)

Set the values of this flag from an input line.

This takes as input a rule string (e.g. !hardclip) and parses it to set the rule. The type of rule it will look for is specified by the regex (e.g. !?hardclip)

Returns:
Returns true if the regex was successfully parsed
